You are the son of my son and you are my grandson. Out of my affection and love for you, I intend to give you some immovable property free of charge, and I hereby give you this property, which is the property of my deceased father, namely, my husband Kakara Subbarao, whose name was registered in the municipality records, with full rights and without any written documents. Since the date of 02-07-2016 has passed, I have acquired the following immovable property, including the water, deposits, common water ways, common roads, easement rights, etc., which have come into my possession and are in my full possession till today, along with all the rights I have, free of charge. The property shall be transferred to you today by writing a settlement deed and filing the said schedule.
Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full rightful owner of the said property and shall pay all taxes due to the Government and shall enjoy it freely and freely as you wish, with full rights of gift and sale, as well as all rights of inheritance and sale, as your son, grandson and descendants shall enjoy it.
Regarding this, I, my heirs, whatever obstacles may arise from time to time, I will settle them all for you and your heirs at our own expense and implement the schedule property in this manner without interruption.
This property is an undisputed and unalienable property, free from any mortgages, sales, purchase agreements, leases, guarantees, etc., and this settlement deed is written and given in your name, believing and creating trust in you.
There are no other male or female heirs or beneficiaries to this property except me. This property has not been assigned as per Government Act No. 9/77. Accordingly, the agreements are filed for the registration of this property in your name.
Kakara Nukalamma

Declaration-1:- The property as per the schedule does not have any mango, coconut, sweet potato trees, betel nut plantations, granite minerals, fish ponds, machinery etc. I hereby bear full responsibility for payment of depreciation duty on such proved property.

I have furnished the undersigned with all the necessary particulars such as title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents of the property in question. I hereby register and certify that I have not transferred/alienated/registered the property in this deed to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me. Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the staff of his office nor the clerk who prepared the draft can have any relation or responsibility in relation to this settlement deed written and registered today. The deed has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the details furnished by me. I hereby declare that I am willing to issue any amendment/confirmation/additional document(s) to this document in writing, if required, without any compensation or delay from the undersigned. I hereby certify that all the information I have provided is true and that if any of the information provided by me is found to be false in the future, I shall be fully responsible for all legal actions and transactions relating to such information. Declaration of the undersigned I have personally examined and shown to the experts all the necessary details such as the title deeds, encumbrance certificate and identity documents of the undersigned and after verifying the truthfulness of the said details, I have registered this deed from the undersigned. Therefore, I hereby declare that I am fully responsible for all the transactions relating to this property. Neither the Sub-Registrar, his office staff nor the draftsman can have any relation or responsibility in relation to this settlement deed written and registered today. This deed has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the details furnished by me. k.harish

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 6131 of 2025, dated 01/Sep/2025, executed by Kakara Nookalamma, in favour of her Son, Kakara Hareesh, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 67.44 Sq. Yds., Dismantled house number 7-1-70/A, Assessment No. 1066005584, Ward No. 7, comprised in survey number 3/2A, situated in Samarlakota Village, Municipality and Mandal, within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Kadiyam, is bounded as follows: North by: 36.5 Ft. House of Kakara Sunil South by: 36.5 Ft. Sandhu Road East by: 16.8 Ft. Others Property West by: 16.8 Ft. House of Cheviti Aruna Note Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
